Copyright notice: This notice must accompany any copy of the images. The images must not be used for commercial purpose without the consent of the copyright owners. The images are not in the public domain. The images can be freely used for educational purposes.

Note: The images were scanned from photographic prints at a resolution of 150 dpi at 8 bits/pixel (256levels) greyscale. The magnifications are dependent upon the size and resolution of your screen, the magnification given for each micrograph are for the original photographs which are approximately 9.5 x 7.5".
Select (click on) an image to see the full resolution version in a separate window.
Alternatively, select either the gif (about 650-700k) or jpeg (about 250-300k) version of the image.
